summary: New version of the old Dwemer Rifle.
descriptionHtml:
=======DWEMER RIFLE TWO-HANDED=======

I\'m open to suggestions for new features in this mod, just leave a comment and I\'ll see if I can do it.

This is a new custom weapon I made based on the Dwemers\' technology.
It has custom sounds for draw/charge/fire.
Resembling a rifle, it shoots projectiles at high speed.

YOU HAVE TO HAVE DAWNGUARD TO USE THIS!!!

=======LOCATION=======

You can obtain it on the Drunken Huntsman on Whiterun. It should be in a table with a book beside it.

=======INFO=======

Perk: Archery (Working!)

Version 1.0: Release

Known Bugs:
-Silly texture bug
-Silly ammo holder

If you discover any, tell me about it.


=======CHANGELOG V 1.0=======

Two Handed Version.
Loadable bullets.
Can be enchanted.


=======FUTURE CHANGES=======

Detailed quest.
Elemental Bullets
And more.

=======CREDITS=======

Credit to the original model goes to 3dregenerator from the website thefree3dmodels.com
author: EdgyBluz aka Naitomere
